Sorry, this journal has no interesting arts. Just a warning.


So, I just stumbled across one of my friend's livejournals.... and I just don't have the courage to just tell her, "Hey, lord knows how I ended up here, but I just spent the last half hour reading your deepest thoughts! Can I watch you?!" ;A; I am such a wimp.

But, I mean, she, by that I mean her journals, really got me to thinking. I LOVE my life. I seriously could not ask for anything better. I have the BEST friends, BEST family, BEST ughh everything ;A; and I really, ugh I think I'm in tears. I really absolutely thank each and everyone one of you for everything. I love you.
And, although life is hard, and I'm not ALWAYS on top of things. And I get stressed out way to fucking much for my own good. I really couldn't be happier. 
I'll be moving away from my family this fall. I haven't really thought about it, but it will be a really big change, and... I think I'm ready. I obviously have more in life to learn, and I wanna just get out there and learn it. and be happy. and live my life. and ahhhhhh fuck everything! I'm going to Japan ASAP and finding the hottest boy and fucking him. okay scratch that. I don't have the guts to do that but hahahhaa oh god I think I'm high or something. 


Uhgh I'm totally going to regret this journal but. it is how I feel. I love you guys <3 Thanks for sticking with me!
/sappy corny sappy end


In a way it's making me crazy,
in the sense that it's making me stronger.
A likely chance, and it's probably proven.
In the end we'll all walk away.
-Ten Cent Blues, Eisley

<3 Sophie

I've been on a roll~~ Just in the past three days I decided to make a story that I could easily turn into a comic. So that means, not a super long, plot intensive one, just with my seven-ish main characters and their day to day adventures/stories/troubles! I sketched each character last night and I'm just coloring them on photoshop now. I have my first character done!


Haha she is not perfect, of course, but you get the idea. 
Dove
Age: 17
Appearance: pale skin (I didn't make it pale enough), white hair, pink eyes with no pupil. Her hair doesn't always have to be down, it can be in braids or intricate buns also.
Odd Trait: the color RED. She absolutely loveees red. She usually wears that red ribbon, around her neck or in her hair...etc
  • Dove
  • Atreus
  • Lyndon
  • Wren
  • Johannes
  • Icarus
  • Hyacinth
  • Zephyr
These are the seven main characters of my story. Each has an odd trait. Some of these include, photographic memory, perfectionist baker, over-protective sibling, and obsession with clocks. Hahaa, I find their traits amusing. Hopefully I'll get the next characters out by the end of this week! I just have to color their headshots~ 
OH, and for right now... the story is called InfraRed unless you guys tell me that is a completely lame name :3

Hello world!

So today is my first day of freedom for two weeks!! Yay for Christmas break! How did I spend it? Drawing and partying with my Japanese Culture Club friends lmao, ohh yeah~




Wow it was the first time I've drawn digitally since... like two months ago ;A; I missed my tablet <3
This was just a quick sketch. I like the soft/purple, but her nose and mouth are weird lol;;
I was listening to Rooney's song, That Girl Has Love~



And this is just a random/small doodle of Jaimee. Jaimee is the main character of Patchwork Feathers! She is the crow princess, and only other crows can see the tattoo of the feathers under her right eye. (which I really need to fix xD) Its a WIP! I'll finish it up tomorrow~~
And then from one to six I was partying with other anime nerds haha. AKA: martial arts, videogames, and movies. We watched Tekkonkinkreet~~ Some people loved it, others were like "WTF." Cause its very surreal haha~ SO MUCH AMAZING SYMBOLISM! Everytime I watch it I see something new~




I love these two~~ So cute!! I also love the soundtrack to the movie...I need to go download it lmao.

So I've been thinking about it, and as much as I tell people I don't like rap music, I really do listen to a lot of songs that contain rap? That is one long sentence. BUT What I mean is, letsee- Gorillaz, 3Oh!3, Gurren Lagann theme song, uhh, some others haha~  I guess I should stop critizing music until I actually listen to it. xD Do you guys have any awesome rap(ish) songs I should listen to?

Sunday Read Revelations by Melissa De La Cruz, very addicting but not spectacular. It's the third book in the series so I /had/ to read it cause I read the first two xD

Monday Caught up on Xam'd at Crunchyroll. Ahh, it is such a great show, a bit depressing but very unique and I LOVE the characters! The way they make the characters so realistic, all of the details they put into each one, is spectacular. And anyone who knows me, knows I rate shows on their characters first, plot second hah;;

Tuesday Got a new puppy!! Her name is Pixie, she is a 4 month old labradoodle, black. She is adorable~~ Here are some pictures...




Hahaa no, my dad isn't hurting her, she just likes to open her mouth and look crazy xD She used to be really bad with nipping/bitting, but she is very good about it now~ We are good trainers lol;

Pixie and Wolfie, our long-haired dachshund! Their relationship has changed so much over the course of five/six days! First wolfie ignored her, then they started fighting, then play-fighting, then they were just nice to each other, and now this!! It is so adorableeee~ You can see our other dog, the black lab Belle (who is like 11 ;A; ) in the corner haha (sorta). But Wolfie is maybe seven or eight? I'm glad he and pixie are getting along ;3
AND THATS IT FOR DOG PHOTOS HAHA /spams you

Wednesday SUCH A TIRING DAY, english and spanish orals, both 10/15 minutes long oh gosh. I was so tired and sorta sick.

Thursday Left school after Bio lab, we are dissecting fetal pigs haha~ But I got home and worked non-stop on my history research paper due friday. I also got into the Gorillaz!! Wowow I love them so much right now!

Friday Relaxing dayyyy, went out to lunch with my good friends, got mexican food and smoothies (the ice cream place was closed ;A;). We made it back JUST before the tardy bell at school hahaha we are awesome.

Saturday Selling candles (luminaries) for our orchestra program at school. House to house selling haha, there are definitely some weird people out there. At one house, I was with my friend Mackenzie, and we ring the doorbell. Some teen comes to the door, he calls for his friend, his friend (who lives there) comes over, he calls his DAD. And by this time I'm making SHADOW PUPPETS on the door LMAO. His dad comes up and is like, "hellooooo???" haha I was really embarrassed xD But yeah, he donated 10 dollars~~
Later I watched the third Lord of the Rings with Mackenzie, LEGOLAS AND GIMLI ARE SO GAY LMAO I love them~ and I hate frodo so muchhh, everyone should watch this hilarious Flight of the Conchords music video.


Laaaater Get home. Open up my letter from Haverford, the school I realllly want to attend for University/College. It is a rejection letter. ughhhh. Oh well, I'll hopefully get into some place that I end up liking better ;A; hopefully.


SOO that was my week~~ So long- omg I'm sorry xD I need to update more often so I don't kill you.

Ahh, so summer is finally over, I go back to school on the 18th. T_T Its my senior year though, so hopefully its not too bad. lol

I finished Stephenie Meyer's Breaking Dawn two days ago. It was--- disappointing. Seriously, at times it was like a horrible smutty crack fic. What was she thinking? And of course it ended SOOO perfectly and Bella was like, the BESTVAMPIREEVER YAY!I enjoyed it, but only because my friend and I made fun of it, and the demon child+bella, the whole time we were reading. It definitely needed more funny jokes, like Jacob's dog bowl, and the blonde jokes, and WHAT THE FUCK. I LOVE THE VOLUTRI, WHY ARE THEY SO WIMPY NOW!? /stops ranting - oh well. it was a satisfying ending I guess. 8)

I watched Tekkonkinkreet again last night 8D and Paprika a second time a few days ago. Those movies are AMAZING, I love japanese animation and stories SOMUCH. I definitely recommend them!

Oh, I'm also watching dubben lagann. All I have to say is, I loooove Leeron's voice so much HAHA. Everyone else is- so-so.

Working on my webcomic Patchwork Feathers, I want to have a solid plot before I draw anything though~ Maybe I'll post some character art here later?

Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children.... IS AWESOME!

I also finished Nana, OMG. If you ever get a chance to watch it or read the manga, its DEFINITELY worth it <3 One of my all time favorite series, right next to Ouran and Romeo x Juliet! 

Its about these two girls, who meet up and find out that both of their names are Nana. Soon after, they move into the same apartment and TONS of awesome stuff, and not so awesome stuff happens. But the punk Nana has a band and I LOVE their songs!! :3

*points to icon/avatar* Thats Shin <3 He is awesome x)

o1. Eeeh. I suck at writing journals. *dies* I mean, IRL I've tried so many times to keep up a diary, or journal. It always fails. I guess I thought making an online journal would work. o2. ECLIPSE *dies* NO SPOILERS HERE but... Ohmigosh that book was LOVE! If you haven't read the Twilight series by Stephenie Meyer yet, YOU MUST! Its like obligatory for everyone... well maybe not boys >.> Unless you want to become gay from loving Edward too much o.o There isn't anything wrong with that! xD   I'm not going to say anything about Eclipse here because some people haven't been able to read it yet. But if you want to talk about it you can email me (wolfie1818@yahoo.com) or comment and be sure to put a SPOILER warning!

o3. Zombie- Loan. An awesome anime strawberrychan got me into. It only has 6 subbed episodes out but you should totally watch it! I can't wait for the next episode!! Anyway, its about this one girl you can see rings around people's necks that no one else can see. And they pretty much mean that person is going to die. Two boys at her school have them but haven't died yet, and soon she finds out they are zombies and they have to pay of a 'zombie-loan' to become human again by killing off other zombies :D SHITO/CHIKA = <3 And totally my OTP x)

o4. FLCL! Another anime, this one is the most random anime I have ever watched... its crazy. I love it xD It only has SIX episodes in the entire series. The whole show is like a metaphor to growing up and stuff you encounter... haha its awesome. And the ending song is the best.... ever. But try it out!

o5. SCHOOL *dies* It starts up on the 20th. I am SOOO not ready, and Junior year is supposed to be the hardest. My procrastination skill won't help either xD

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEWWWWWWWWW!!!! *spaz*

You are probably wondering what the heck I'm talking about... lets start from the begining.

I get home today from my Youth Orchestra and I walk over to the front stairs, my house has two staircases and I usually put my shoes in the front after coming throught the garage. So as I get close (like 6 ft) I see this GIGANTIC FREAKING BUG crawling all around the tile floor by the stairs and I spaz out and run around the living room until my dad goes to see and soon squish the bug. I watch from the landing above the stairs afters going up the back staircase. So my dad gets a paper towel and squishes the bug and is like, "What the--?!" And out pop HUNDREDS of little baby spiders!! My dad gets the windex and sprays the floor all over and wipes up the babies. I hope he got them all because as you can tell I have a DEATHLY fear of arachnids. *dies*

Lesson for today...

- Watch out when you see a humongous spider, because when you squish it  might just be in the process of giving birth to hundreds, no THOUSANDS of little baby spiders.

<3 Emelia
